00001 #include "APathCommandParser.h"
00002 #include "PathDataParser.h"
00003 #include "PathComponent.h"
00004 
00005 #include "../math/EllipticalArc.h"
00006 using namespace jvgs::math;
00007 
00008 using namespace std;
00009 
00010 namespace jvgs
00011 {
00012     namespace sketch
00013     {
00014         APathCommandParser::APathCommandParser()
00015         {
00016         }
00017 
00018         APathCommandParser::~APathCommandParser()
00019         {
00020         }
00021 
00022         void APathCommandParser::parse(Path *path, char command,
00023                 PathDataParser *dataParser, const vector<float> &arguments)
00024                 const
00025         {
00026             /* We take the vectors two by two and add lines to the
00027              * path component. */
00028             for(vector<float>::size_type  i = 0; i < arguments.size(); i += 7) {
00029                 Vector2D start = dataParser->getCurrentPoint();
00030                 Vector2D radius(arguments[i], arguments[i + 1]);
00031                 float xAxisRotation = arguments[i + 2];
00032                 bool largeArc = (arguments[i + 3] != 0);
00033                 bool sweep = (arguments[i + 4] != 0);
00034                 Vector2D end(arguments[i + 5], arguments[i + 6]);
00035                 end = dataParser->toAbsoluteSpace(command, end);
00036 
00037                 EllipticalArc *segment = new EllipticalArc(
00038                         dataParser->toWorldSpace(start), radius, xAxisRotation,
00039                         largeArc, sweep, dataParser->toWorldSpace(end));
00040                 dataParser->getCurrentComponent()->addSegment(segment);
00041 
00042                 dataParser->setCurrentPoint(end);
00043             }
00044 
00045             dataParser->setLastControlPoint(dataParser->getCurrentPoint());
00046         }
00047     }
00048 }
